summary: Bayer AG is a German multinational company that makes medicines, health products, and agricultural chemicals. It was founded in 1863 and is known for creating Aspirin. The company has a long history, including a merger with other German firms to form IG Farben. After World War II, IG Farben was broken up due to its Nazi connections. Bayer is also known for its sports sponsorship, owning the football club Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Recently, Bayer's merger with Monsanto was controversial due to legal issues.
title: Bayer
